pr_title: Empty card: update at most once by second

timeline.message:
Empty card: update at most once by second

Checking the profiler, I see that some significant amount of time is spent enqueuing various update. This is uselessly
long when empty card is optimized

long when empty card is optimized

timeline.bodyHTML:
Suggested change
// Time in second, so this ensure one update by second at most
// Ensure updates only happen if more than a percent of progress happened
timeline.author: mikehardy
